categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Assault on the DSI Hyperbaride Synthesis Plant

This assault was led by a group of Rebel Alliance operatives and a band of Sekct on an Imperial hyperbaride synthesis plant on the planet Marca. One of the plant's security chiefs, Marci Sertim, overloaded the plant's hyperbatteries and set it on self-destruct, but not before the plant's managing director, Vost Tyne, escaped.
